casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Charles S. Lange (9333)

O’Connell, Foti and Landau, Js.

Argued January 14 decision released January 29, 1991 Charles S. Lange, pro se, the appellant (defendant). James M. Ralls, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Mary Galvin, state’s attorney, and Paul Gaetano, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
